Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a go-ahead grand slam in the sixth inning to propel the Mets past the rival Phillies, 4-1.
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets advance to the NLCS for the first time in nine years.
Carlos Mendoza gave his speech before Round 3 of the champagne showers this October.
The Mets' improbable 2024 journey is going to the NLCS.
This Mets team just has it. A well-deserved series win over Philadelphia came from a blend of strong pitching and clutch hitting.
This is one of the best team's in Major League Baseball and they showed that yet again in the Phillies series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pete Alonso decided to dance on a table in the Mets wild postgame celebrations.
Edwin Diaz struck out Kyle Schwarber to advance to the NLCS for the first time in nine years.
